oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Telegram
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A western Union Telegram reading ",11 nn 40 Govt WASHINGTON DC 504pm 11/9/ MR HENRY H PRING (crossed out and overwritten Ring) RFD 4 FRANKLIN TENN DEEPLY REGRET TO INFORM YOU THAT IT IS OFFICALLY REPORTED/ THAT PRIVATE FRANK M RING MACHINE GUN BATTALLION DIED OCTOBER/ NINTH FROM WOUNDS RECEIVED IN ACTION/ HARRIS THE ADJ GEN". Pvt. Frank M. Ring, Co. A, 114th MG Battn., 30th Div. was from Franklin, Williamson County, Tennessee. His two older brothers also served. They both survived the war.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
